ruleDefinition: from inputStream select json:toObject(s3log) as obj insert into temp; from temp select json:getString(obj,'$.s3log.requestId') as access_requester,json:getString(obj,'$.s3log.httpStatus') as attempted_response,json:getString(obj,'$.s3log.bucket') as accessed_bucket,json:getString(obj,'$.s3log.operation') as attempted_action insert into temp2;from every( e1 = temp2 ) -> e2 = temp2[ e1.access_requester == access_requester and (e1.attempted_response == attempted_response) and attempted_response == '404'] within 30 sec select e1.access_requester , e1.attempted_response, e1.accessed_bucket,e1.attempted_action insert into outputStream;
